headline: A Closer Look at Q2 Earnings: What Can Investors Expect?
summary: Total S&P 500 earnings for the June quarter are expected to be up +4.9% from the same period last year on +3.9% higher revenues, with three Zacks sectors currently expected to post double-digit earnings growth.

raw.headline: A Closer Look at Q2 Earnings: What Can Investors Expect?
raw.summary: Total S&P 500 earnings for the June quarter are expected to be up +4.9% from the same period last year on +3.9% higher revenues, with three Zacks sectors currently expected to post double-digit earnings growth.

headline: Fed proposes easing leverage ratio rules for large banks
summary: Investing.com -- The U.S. Federal Reserve has proposed changes to ease the Enhanced Supplementary Leverage Ratio for large banks, potentially reducing capital requirements significantly.

headline: Big banks are closer to getting one of biggest regulatory rollbacks since 2008
summary: US regulators on Wednesday proposed one of the most dramatic rollbacks of bank capital rules since the 2008 financial crisis, which would give a major victory to lenders seeking relief from the new Trump administration.
